mapper.select: SELECT * FROM housedeals WHERE apt_seq = #{aptSeq} ORDER BY deal_year DESC, deal_month DESC, deal_day DESC
SELECT * FROM dongcodes WHERE dong_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dongName}, '%') OR gugun_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dongName}, '%') OR sido_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dongName}, '%')
SELECT DISTINCT gugun_name FROM dongcodes WHERE gugun_name IS NOT NULL AND gugun_name != '' ORDER BY gugun_name
SELECT DISTINCT dong_code, sido_name, gugun_name, dong_name FROM dongcodes WHERE gugun_name = #{gugunName} AND dong_name IS NOT NULL AND dong_name != '' ORDER BY dong_name
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO property_scraps (user_id, apt_seq, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{aptSeq}, NOW())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM property_scraps WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND apt_seq = #{aptSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT h.* FROM houseinfos h JOIN property_scraps ps ON h.apt_seq = ps.apt_seq WHERE ps.user_id = #{userId}
